16
A new proposal
Linguistic Information Repository - LIR
• It is modelled as an ontology.
• The linguistic information captured in the LIR is organized 
around the LexicalEntry class.
• A lexical entry is a ternary relation: Lexicalization, 
Sense and LanguageContext. 
• Note is linked to the Lexicalization, but it could be 
linked to any other class in the model to include supplemental 
information. 
• By linking Note to the Sense or Definition classes, 
possible differences or nuances among senses in different 
languages can  be made explicit.
